links.title: Apple, Amazon hit back at claims China put spy chips in their systems
links.description: Tech giants including Apple and Amazon have hit back at claims by Bloomberg their servers may have been fitted with tiny microchips placed there by Chinese spies. The chips, which were 'not much bigger than a grain of rice,' would have given China unprecedented backdoor access to computers and data, according to Bloomberg.

messages.body:
$AAPL @StockLizard 
Stop spreading fake news. DHS put out a statement that they support the Co‚Äôs denial of such nonsense

message.body: $AAPL So much for security. Want cheap Chinese slave labor? Take a side of Secret Spy chips with that.
